Name: Ancillary Monitor Corpus: Common Crawl - German Web
Description: This is a continuously updated corpus of the German-language internet, with a new release published every year. The corpus currently covers the years 2013-2024. The corpus is based on data dumps from CommonCrawl. The filtering and subsequent processing was carried out using CorpusExplorer with additional supplementary scripts, and TreeTagger was used for the automatic annotation. The corpus is available for download from LINDAT.
